TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CompleteWizardStep extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep

Docs.summary: Defines the template of the final step for creating a user account with the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The CompleteWizardStep class is derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep> and used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control. By default the CompleteWizardStep step is displayed after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep> step. The CompleteWizardStep step is a required step of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType StepType { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the type of user interface (UI) to display for the page of a control.
Docs.value: The enumeration value for the enumeration.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The StepType property specifies the type of navigation UI to display for the final user account creation step (the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep> step) of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
> [!CAUTION] > The StepType property overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.StepType%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to ensure that <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompleteWizardStep> is always set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType> value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType> enumeration. Attempting to set the StepType property to a different value will result in an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

Docs.exception: An attempt was made to set the StepType property.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string Title { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the title to display for the final user account creation step of the control.
Docs.value: The title to use for the final user account creation step of the control. The default value is "Complete".

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
